         Home     Investor Overview 
        
       
     

   

   
     

              
 
                 
         Investor Overview 
       
              


 


   Karnalyte Resources has significant potash and magnesium chloride resources in a proven mining jurisdiction. Using a phased construction approach, Karnalyte plans to construct a facility that will initially produce 625,000 tonnes of potash per year, increasing to 2.125 million tonnes of potash per year with lower capital expenditures than those associated with the construction of traditional potash mines.
